docs.lead_paragraph: Yetta Furst thought two days ago that she would spend her honeymoon with Samuel Ryman at Coney Island on Sunday, and that they would both be back at work to-day adding to a sum she had saved for furnishing their flat. Ryman, who lives at 55 Broome Street, had been devoted to Yetta, calling at her home, 159 Attorney Street, with great regularity, bringing her flowers and treating her to ice cream.

headline.main: LETTER STOPS A WEDDING; Fiancee Finds One to "Dear Wife" -- Wedding Feast Served.
